definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
surname Shao/name of an ancient state that existed in what is now Shaanxi Province
to call together/to summon/to convene/temple or monastery (used in place names in Inner Mongolia)
to introduce (sb to sb)/to give a presentation/to present (sb for a job etc)/introduction
Shaoxing prefecture level city in Zhejiang
Shaoxing prefecture level city in Zhejiang
Yuan Shao (153-202), general during late Han, subsequently warlord
Shaoxing wine a.k.a. "yellow wine", traditional Chinese wine made from glutinous rice and wheat
to follow in one's father's footsteps

sentences.english: The production of PET elastomeric yarns was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 绍了子午胎帘子布用涤纶弹力纬纱的制造技术。

sentences.english: Szostak brings a lot of tools to the project.
sentences.chinese: 绍斯塔克在这个项目中引入了很多工具。

sentences.english: Szostak was born in London, grew up in Canada and is now a U. S. citizen.
sentences.chinese: 绍斯塔克出生在伦敦，在加拿大长大，现为美国国籍。

sentences.english: Szostak's experiments show that cell walls are hardiest at near freezing temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 绍斯塔克的实验表明细胞壁在冰点附近最牢固。

sentences.english: It depends on why the dollar is seeing strength, Shaoul argues.
sentences.chinese: 绍乌尔认为，是否出现将取决于美元此番走强的原因。

sentences.english: Dr. Szostak was born in London, grew up in Canada and is now a U.S. citizen.
sentences.chinese: 绍斯塔克出生在伦敦，在加拿大长大，现为美国国籍。

sentences.english: Szostak, the third winner, was born in London and grew up in Canada.
sentences.chinese: 第三位获奖者绍斯塔克出生于伦敦，在加拿大长大。

definition: to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
class or grade/generation/plaintiff and defendant (old)/government department (old)
